channel.title: 1. Getting Started on Code Coverage Dashboard
channel.description: Recent content in 1. Getting Started on Code Coverage Dashboard

item.title: Installation
item.description: Using Docker Not implemented yet docker-compose up -d Setup Manually 0. Pre requisites Lang Version Nodejs 16.0 Golang 1.18 Sqlite3 or Mysql - Caddy 2.4.* 1. Clone this repository git clone https://github.com/rakutentech/code-coverage-dashboard.git 2. Set up backend server Copy .

item.title: Verify
item.description: Services Domain Purpose /coverages-api/health Health Check for the service /coverages-api Serves GET, POST, PUT API for Github Actions and the Dashboard /coverages-api/badge Provides a badge /coverages-api/assets Provides assets of artifacts /coverages-api/dashboard Code coverage dashboard
